item.title: Letters from Edinburgh: 3
item.description: **19/09/2009 THE BEGINNING: PART 3** Hello all! It has been nearly 10 days since I got here. Freshersâ€™ week was very fun! I went for lots of cool events where we got to meet people from all sorts of fields from genomics to international politics and everything in between!
